name: Shorty

topics.topic: BigtownTownServicesDo you have any traders in town? Any doctors?
topics.topic_text: What's there to do here, anyway?
topics.response_text: Hey, I'm not your personal tour guide! Besides, there's nothing to do in Big Town. Super Mutants tore everything apart.{Shorty has an inflated sense of importance, and he gets offended when asked for directions.}

topics.topic: BigtownTownWhatsWrongThis place looks like a ghost town.
topics.topic_text: What do you think will happen to Big Town?
topics.response_text: You've seen those Super Mutants and their ... appetite. There's no way Bigtown will survive with them around.{Shorty is referring to his time in Germantown, when he was almost eaten by a super mutant.}

topics.topic: BigtownTownWhereDidYouComeFromWhere did you people come from, anyway?
topics.topic_text: Do you know how Big Town got started?
topics.response_text: From the look of things, I'd say a Super Mutant sat down in a ditch one day and shat out this town.{Shorty is indignant. He has a natural sense of self-importance that has been challenged.}
Well, hotshot. Are you going to teach us something, or just stand there looking stupid?{annoyed}
That sucks! Really? She's dead? Damnit. Let's get out of here, and maybe we can kill a few Super Mutants on the way out! Come on!
We'll stick with you, don't worry!{happy to be rescued, scared they aren't safe yet}

topics.topic_text: Looks like you could use a weapon.
topics.response_text: Hell, yeah! Lay it on me.{happy to be rescued, scared they aren't safe yet}

topics.topic_text: Hold on, short stuff. Who are you and what are you doing here?
topics.response_text: What does it look like? The Super Mutants raided Big Town and dragged me off here. I'm sure they're about to eat me. You can't just leave me here!

topics.topic_text: What makes you think I'm here to rescue you?
topics.response_text: That isn't funny! We've got to get out of here before the Super Mutants come back to have me for lunch!

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I'm not here to rescue you. In fact, I've got to get going.
topics.response_text: You can't just leave me here! They're going to eat me!
Then let's get out of here! Don't forget we've got to get Red, too. She's still upstairs in the holding pens.

topics.topic_text: Come on, let's get out of here.

topics.response_text: Alright, if you say so boss. But if we get to Big Town and she isn't there, I'll kill you.{distrustful and deadly serious}

conversation.response_text: I keep asking you about that, but you never listen. Next time, I'm just going to thrust a hammer and nails into your hands.{Shorty is upset that no one listens to his requests.}
Well, you could help ME by resetting the barricades.{Shorty emphasizes the word "me." He is big on his own importance.}
You better get started then. Hurry up! I don't like to wait.{Pappy's attempt at dissuading Shorty has no effect.}

conversation.topic_text: Wait here until I get back.
conversation.response_text: If you're not back soon, we're outta here!{scared}
Come on, let me loose!{excited (getting rescued from certain death)}
Die Mutants, DIE!!!!{(cheering) in an excited cheering mob}
You freak! You're going to eat me, aren't you?{angry (covering fear)}
Me too! Now, let's get the hell out of here!{happy}

combat.response_text: You'll have to kill me this time, mutie bastards!

description:
Shorty (Short-T) is a 19 year-old Asian Male.

A short-tempered resident of Big Town who was originally from Little Lamplight. Despite his nickname originating from his bad temper rather than his stature, Shorty is one of the younger adults in Big Town.

Shorty (Short-T)'s Personality: Irritable, defensive, but ultimately loyal to Big Town. He has a strong sense of justice and is protective of his fellow residents.

Shorty (Short-T)'s Backstory: Born and raised in Little Lamplight, Shorty was expelled when he reached adulthood. He joined Big Town, where his short temper quickly earned him the nickname 'Short-T.' Despite his abrasive personality, he cares deeply about the survival of Big Town and its residents.
